近五年代表性学术论文（第一作者或通讯作者）

长期围绕城市景观水体富营养化、重金属污染等开展园林植物生态修复理论研究工作，并针对园林植物种质资源、繁殖栽培技术与园林应用开展研究工作，在国内外期刊发表论文百余篇。
（1）Pre-aeration of the rhizosphere offers potential for phytoremediation of heavy metal-contaminated wetlands. Journal of Hazardous Materials，2019（1区 TOP）
（2）Transcriptional, secondary metabolic, and antioxidative investigations elucidate the rapid response mechanism of Pontederia cordata to cadmium. Ecotoxicology and Environmental Safety，2022（2区TOP）
（3） Physiological defense and metabolic strategy of Pistia stratiotes in response to zinc-cadmium co-pollution. Plant Physiology and Biochemistry，2022（2区）
（4） Pontederia cordata, an ornamental aquatic macrophyte with great potential in phytoremediation of heavy-metal contaminated wetlands. Ecotoxicology and environmental safety，2020（2区TOP）
（5） Effects of aqueous extracts from the thizome of Pontederia cordata on the growth and interspecific competition of two algal species. Ecotoxicology and environmental safety，2019（2区）   
（6） Tolerance mechanism of Triarrhena sacchariflora (Maxim.) Nakai. seedlings to lead and cadmium: Translocation, subcellular distribution, chemical forms and variations in leaf ultrastructure. Ecotoxicology and environmental safety，2018 （2区）    
（7） Micropropagation of tree peony (Paeonia sect. Moutan): A review. Plant Cell Tissue and Organ Culture，2020（2区）    
（8） Succinic acid inhibits photosynthesis of Microcystis aeruginosa via damaging PSII oxygen-evolving complex and reaction center，Environmental Science and Pollution Research，2021（3区）
（9） Cadmium phytotoxicity, related physiological changes in Pontederia cordata: anti-oxidative, osmoregulatory substances, phytochelatins, photosynthesis, and chlorophyll fluorescence. Environmental Science and Pollution Research，2020（3区）
（10）Effective hawkmoth pollination in the primarily bee-pollinated Salvia daiguii—an example of adaptive generalization，Plant Species Biology，2022（3区）
（11）Soil erosion effectively alleviated by Miscanthus sacchariflorus, a potential candidate for land deterioration improvement，Rhizosphere，2023（3区）
